LightningComponentBundle.description: A modern, configurable list view component to replace the standard related list. Configure columns, sorting, search, and pagination through the Lightning App Builder.

property.name: soqlQuery
property.label: SOQL Query
property.description: Base SOQL query. Use {recordId} for current record context and {currentUserId} for logged-in user's ID. Example: SELECT Id, Name FROM Task WHERE OwnerId = {currentUserId}

property.name: listViewTitle
property.label: List View Title
property.description: Title displayed at the top of the list view

property.name: listViewSubtitle
property.label: List View Subtitle
property.description: Smaller grey text displayed below the title and record count

property.name: hoverRowColorHex
property.label: Hover Row Color (Hex)
property.description: Hex color code for row hover highlight. Example: #006EC8

property.name: displaySearchBox
property.label: Display Search Box
property.description: Toggle search box visibility

property.name: displayActionsButton
property.label: Display Actions Button
property.description: Toggle actions menu (Refresh, Export) visibility

property.name: selectableRows
property.label: Selectable Rows
property.description: Enable row selection with checkboxes. When enabled, users can select multiple records and perform bulk actions like Change Owner.

property.name: displayRowActions
property.label: Display Row Actions
property.description: Display a row actions menu with View, Edit, and Change Owner options on each row.

property.name: recordCountPerPage
property.label: Records Per Page
property.description: Number of records to display per page. Pagination appears if more records exist.

property.name: defaultSortableColumn
property.label: Default Sort Column
property.description: API name of the field to sort by default. Leave blank for no default sorting.

property.name: allowUserSort
property.label: Allow User Sorting
property.description: Allow users to change the sort column by clicking headers

property.name: column1FieldApiName
property.label: Column 1 - Field API Name
property.description: API name of the field to display in column 1. Example: Name, Custom_Field__c, Account.Name

property.name: column1UiLabel
property.label: Column 1 - Custom Label
property.description: Custom label for column 1. Leave blank to use the default field label.

property.name: column1DisplayAsPill
property.label: Column 1 - Display as Pill
property.description: Display picklist values as colored pills/badges

property.name: column1PillColors
property.label: Column 1 - Pill Color Mapping
property.description: Map values to colors. Format: Value1:#hex1,Value2:#hex2. Example: Won:#2e844a,Lost:#ba0517,Pending:#fe9339

property.name: column1FilterValues
property.label: Column 1 - Quick Filter Values
property.description: Enable quick filter dropdown for this column. Enter comma-separated picklist values. Example: Open,Closed,Pending
